answers.author: Caitlyn Mitchell
answers.text:
Malika,
The Alliance has several great examples about rural to urban development as well as general infill practices. Below is a link to a program outlined in Phoenix, AZ. 
http://transformgov.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/9165/Vacant_Properties_Roundtable_Phoenix_Infill_Incentives
If you need further examples please visit the "documents" section of the Knowledge Network and enter a key term like "infill." You should be able to find as many case studies and practicle documents as you want. 
Thanks!


Malika,

author: malika pradhan
text: Can someone point me to “good practice” of rural land consolidation, land pooling, land appropriation, where rural land use was converted to urban (non agricultural) uses? I am mostly looking for examples form developed countries. Any case studies or practical documents would be very helpful.
title: Rural land consolidation by gov to provide infrastructure
